sentence.text: Drug interaction studies with decitabine have not been conducted.
sentence.negationtags: Drug interaction studies with decitabine have <scope> <cue> not </cue> been conducted. </scope>

sentence.text: In vitro studies in human liver microsomes suggest that decitabine is unlikely to inhibit or induce cytochrome P450 enzymes.
sentence.negationtags: <scope> In vitro studies in human liver microsomes suggest that decitabine is <cue> unlikely </cue> </scope> to inhibit or induce cytochrome P450 enzymes.

sentence.text: In vitro metabolism studies have suggested that decitabine is not a substrate for the human liver cytochrome P450 enzymes.
sentence.negationtags: In vitro metabolism studies have suggested that decitabine is <scope> <cue> not </cue> a substrate for the human liver cytochrome P450 enzymes. </scope>

sentence.text: As plasma protein binding of decitabine is negligible ( 1%), interactions due to displacement of more highly protein bound drugs from plasma proteins are not expected.
sentence.negationtags: As plasma protein binding of decitabine is negligible ( 1%), interactions due to displacement of more highly protein bound drugs from plasma proteins are <scope> <cue> not </cue> expected. </scope>
